Articles - Technology¶

TEK1

B. Adida, M. Birbeck, and I. Herman. RDFa Core 1.1 - Second Edition. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2013. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/rdfa-core/.

TEK2

J. Carroll and J. Pan. XML Schema Datatypes in RDF and OWL. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2006. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/swbp-xsch-datatypes/.

TEK3

J. Craig and M. Cooper. Accessible Rich Internet Applications 1.0. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2014. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/.

TEK4

P. Groth and L. Moreau. An Overview of the PROV Family of Documents. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2013. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/prov-overview/.

TEK5

S. Harris and A. Seaborne. SPARQL 1.1 Query Language. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2013. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/.

TEK6

P. Hayes and P. Patel-Schneider. RDF 1.1 Semantics. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2014. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/rdf11-mt/.

TEK7

M. Hearst. Design Recommendations for Hierarchical Faceted Search Interfaces. ACM SIGIR Workshop on Faceted Search, 2006.

TEK8

I. Hickson, T. Leithead, and E. O'Connor. HTML5. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2014. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/.

TEK9

R. Iannella and J. McKinney. vCard Ontology. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2014. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/vcard-rdf/.

TEK10

G. Kellogg, I. Hickson, and I. Herman. Microdata to RDF. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2012. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/microdata-rdf/.

TEK11

A. Miles and S. Bechhofer. SKOS Simple Knowledge Organization System. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2009. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/skos-reference.

TEK12

B. Motik, P. Patel-Schneider, and B. Grau. OWL 2 Web Ontology Language. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2012. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/owl2-direct-semantics/.

TEK13

N. Noy and A. Rector. Defining N-ary Relations on the Semantic Web. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2006. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/swbp-n-aryRelations.

TEK14

M. Sporny, G. Kellogg, and I. Herman. HTML+RDFa 1.1. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2013. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/html-rdfa/.

TEK15

M. Sporny, G. Kellogg, and M. Lanthaler. JSON-LD 1.0. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2014. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/json-ld/.

TEK16

E. Stoica and M. Hearst. Nearly-Automated Metadata Hierarchy Creation. Proceedings of the Human Language Technologies: Annual Conference of the North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics, pages 117–120, 2004. Boston, MA.

TEK17

E. Stoica, M. Hearst, and M. Richardson. Automating Creation of Hierarchical Faceted Metadata Structures. Proceedings of the Human Language Technologies: Annual Conference of the North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics, 2007. Rochester NY.

TEK18

T. Berners-Lee and D. Connolly. Notation3 (N3): A readable RDF syntax. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2011. URL: http://www.w3.org/TeamSubmission/n3/.

TEK19

No author identified. GNU General Public License. Free Software Foundation, 2008. Boston, MA.

TEK20

No author identified. GNU Manuals Online. Free Software Foundation, 2010. Boston, MA.

TEK21

No author identified. Philosophy of the GNU Project. Free Software Foundation, 2010. Boston, MA.

TEK22

E. Prud'hommeaux and Y. Lafon. REST and Linked Data. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2015. URL: http://www.w3.org/2012/ldp/charter.

TEK23

E. Prud'hommeaux and T. Berners-Lee. RDF 1.1 Turtle. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2014. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/turtle/.

TEK24

A. van Kesteren. Cross-Origin Resource Sharing. World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), 2014. URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/cors/.
